name: BCP_UFO
description: A modern fresh outlook for SAP Customer Support System
additional_info:
Fixes:
1. Hover effect on box elements of home page. - Aiming to help increasing user focus on each box currently in use. (.th-box)

2. UFO symbol added to up right corner (.testmode:after )

3. When BCP UFO has been opened via a copy pasted link, pointing to specific content, graphicon chart icon, excel, tag and personalize icons were missing and colors of this icons were replaced to black.

23.03.2018
4. increased border radius on incident view page buttons
5. recent incidents were not readable in navbar on left due to decreased column-width 
6. paste formatted text's editor box height were too small , it has been fixed

10.04.2018
7. fixing texteditor font-size afte BTE update

18.04.2018
8. updated welcome screen with typewriter animation
9. the loading spinner  icon has been changed to a modern one.
